The Bennettsville SC Works Center will be closed Thursday, April 3 and Friday, April 4, 2025 due to maintenance.

All Catawba SC Works centers will be closed on Friday, March 28, 2025. All locations will reopen at regular hours on Monday, March 31, 2025.
